original_title: Sex Trek II: The Search for Sperm
overview: Captain James Quirk and the crew of the Starship Plunderer search an uncharted star system for their missing First Officer, Mr. Sperm, who was abducted by a race of 7000 sex-starved space babes wanting to worship the mightiest penis in the universe.
title: Sex Trek II: The Search for Sperm
